question: What percentage of male employees at Microsoft UK received a bonus payment during the year to 5th April 2025?
What is the difference between the proportion of men receiving Benefits in Kind at Microsoft Ireland in 2024 versus men receiving bonus pay at Microsoft UK in 2025?
reference_answer: 91.2% of men at Microsoft Ireland received Benefits in Kind and 96.8% of men at Microsoft UK received bonus pay.

question: What percentage is the mean gender hourly pay gap at Apple (UK) LIMITED in 2025?
